ygData.subject: Re: Level times
ygData.msgSnippet: Except for the fact that he took what I said out of context. I didn t say I wanted to solo, and I didn t say I wanted to solo dragons even at 50. I said that
ygData.messageBody:
Except for the fact that he took what I said out of
context. I didn't say I wanted to solo, and I didn't
say I wanted to solo dragons even at 50. I said that
even when you reach level 50, there is plenty more to
do in the game.

The reason why I stated the RP is 1/10th of UO was to
explain the reason why I powerlevel. I wouldn't go
back there due to the reasons I stated before: Player
Killers, bugs and exploits.

If you enjoy mapping or whatever, that's good for you.



--- dlobdell <dlobdell@...> wrote:
> From: "dlobdell" <dlobdell@...>
>
> I totally agree with you John, finally something
> intelligent+ACE-
>
> Wes Lobdell,
----snip----
> -----Original Message-----
> From: John A. Williams
> John+AF8-Williams+AEA-Jabil.com
> To: 'EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com'
> EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
> Date: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 10:10 PM
> Subject: RE: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Level times
>
>
> From: +ACI-John A. Williams+ACI-
> John+AF8-Williams+AEA-Jabil.com
>
> Damn man, what do you think a dragon should be
> able to be soloed?
> The game is only what you make of it, so if you
> think its 1/10th of UO
> Then go back there or like you said play
> heroes. I can't stress the fact
> That you get out only what you put in to the
> game. I have nights where
> I'll do nothing but try to map, I guess that
> makes me lame since I'm not
> Leveling while I'm doing it though huh? If
> someone is not enjoying the
> Game then try to find a different circle of
> friends, they may be the cause.
> Or try going to a different area. sorry for the
> rant all but this list has
> somehow
> Gone from cheats to a bitch list and I know I'm
> not helping here but anywho.
> God forbid anyone have to group...
> John
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Doug Sorensen
>
+AFs-SMTP:belgarth+AF8-of+AF8-surefall+AEA-yahoo.com+AF0-
> Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 6:28 PM
> To: EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
> Subject: RE: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Level times
>
> From: Doug Sorensen
> belgarth+AF8-of+AF8-surefall+AEA-yahoo.com
>
> I am not really in a great hurry, but I like
> to see
> my character advance. The RP aspects of this
> game are
> about 1/10th of UO's even though that game was
> riddled
> with Player Killers, bugs and exploits. I
> enjoy the
> game, but I feel after playing similar game
> types that
> this game corrals you more into the powergamer
> role.
>
> I get into the mindset that I can play this
> game for a
> few hours and be about the same as I started
> or I can
> play something like Heroes of Might and Magic
> III and
> go through a few scenarios.
>
> I will more likely plan to leave due to slow
> leveling
> than I would if I would see constant
> improvements in
> my character.
>
> Even level 50s still have to go in two full
> groups to
> take on the tougher stuff like the dragons.
>
> Belgarth Wolfstrider
>
